item.title: FO - Checkout - Show details
item.description: FO - Checkout - Show details Details Component : Core Status : [TEST] To be automated Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-5110 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to FO > Add multiple products to your cart > Proceed to checkout > Proceed to checkout > Click on Show details The complete list of products present in the cart is displayed For each product must be filled in: - The picture - the name

item.title: FO - Checkout - Add a promo code
